Title: Anterior Ischemic Optic Neuropathy After Dental Extraction
text: While often idiopathic, anterior ischemic optic neuropathy occasionally may occur from an identifiable cause.

Title: Dermoscopy and the diagnosis of primary cutaneous B-cell lymphoma
text: Primary cutaneous B-cell lymphomas (PCBCLs) are frequently misdiagnosed, and a biopsy is needed to attain the correct diagnosis.

Title: Is CO2 insufflation an amelioration of routine colonoscopy?
text: The insufflation of gas during colonoscopy leads to distention of the colon with abdominal discomfort and pain for the patients.

Title: Clinical relevance of aortic calcification in urolithiasis patients
text: The aim of the present study is to investigate the clinical relevance of aortic calcification in urolithiasis patients.

Title: Predictive factors and outcomes of negative appendectomy
text: The aim of this study was to assess predictive factors for negative appendectomy and to evaluate the outcomes of negative appendectomy.

Title: Visuospatial training improves elementary students' mathematics performance
text: Although spatial ability and mathematics performance are highly correlated, there is scant research on the extent to which spatial ability training can improve mathematics performance.

Title: Outcomes of mitochondrial derived diseases: a single-center experience
text: The purpose of this study is to help elucidate which part of the mitochondria is causing a problem through anamnesis, physical examination, and routine biochemical tests in the event of a suspected mitochondrial disease case.

Title: Electrical Grounding Improves Vagal Tone in Preterm Infants
text: Low vagal tone (VT) is a marker of vulnerability to stress and the risk of developing necrotizing enterocolitis in preterm infants.

Title: The effects of photochromic lenses on visual performance
text: The purpose of the current study was to evaluate the effects of filtering by an activated photochromic lens on visual performance in healthy adults.

Title: Analysis of Extended Deep Fat Pad Excision in Abdominoplasty
text: Because abdominoplasty flap's major vascularization is suprafascial, some surgeons perform excision of the deep fat pad below Scarpa's fascia to achieve a better abdominal contour and balance the lower abdominal projection above and below the scar.

Title: Effect of progressive relaxation exercises on primary dysmenorrhea in Turkish students: A randomized prospective controlled trial
text: A randomized prospective controlled study was conducted concerning the effects of progressive relaxation exercises on the reduction of pain in primary dysmenorrhea.

Title: Inter-rater reliability of the Chedoke Arm and Hand Activity Inventory
text: The Chedoke Arm and Hand Activity Inventory (CAHAI) is an assessment of upper limb function designed for use in the stroke population.

Title: Intraoperative Real-Time Assessment of Liver Function with Near-Infrared Fluorescence Imaging
text: Postoperative liver failure is a serious complication after major hepatectomy, and perioperative prediction of its incidence using current technology is still very difficult.

Title: An ethnographic observation study of the facilitator role in an implementation process
text: Even though the importance of a facilitator during an implementation process is well described, the facilitator's role is rarely problematized in relation to the organizational context in terms of power and legitimacy; themes which have recently been brought to the fore when studying change in health care organizations.

Title: Test Anxiety and Poor Sleep: A Vicious Cycle
text: Test anxiety may be better thought of as a biopsychosocial process affecting academic performance during the days leading up to an exam, rather than a static appraisal of attitudes related to test taking.

Title: Mediating Mechanisms in a Physical Activity Intervention: A Test of Habit Formation
text: A recent randomized controlled trial found that an intervention focused on developing an exercise habit increased weekly minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity (MVPA) over 8 wk compared to a control group.

Title: Surgical decision making in a teaching hospital: a linguistic analysis
text: The aim of the study was to gain insight in the involvement of non-operating surgeons in intraoperative surgical decision making at a teaching hospital.

Title: Improving number abilities in low achieving preschoolers: Symbolic versus non-symbolic training programs
text: Although previous correlational studies have shown that both symbolic and non-symbolic abilities relate to mathematical abilities, correlational studies cannot show the cause and effect of these abilities for mathematical success.

Title: Food exchange estimation by children with type 1 diabetes at summer camp
text: As exchange counting poses difficulty for children with type 1 diabetes (T1D) attending diabetes camps, they often guesstimate food amount without performing an exchange calculation.

Title: Negative Symptoms and Avoidance of Social Interaction: A Study of Non-Verbal Behaviour
text: Non-verbal behaviour is fundamental to social interaction.

Title: Efficacy of percutaneous endoscopic gastro-jejunostomy (PEG-J) decompression therapy for patients with chronic intestinal pseudo-obstruction (CIPO)
text: Chronic intestinal pseudo-obstruction (CIPO) is an intractable rare digestive disease manifesting persistent small bowel distension without any mechanical cause.

Title: Gastrointestinal motility following thoracic surgery: the effect of thoracic epidural analgesia. A randomised controlled trial
text: Impairment of gastrointestinal (GI) motility is an undesirable but inevitable consequence of surgery.

Title: The Effects of Talus Control Foot Orthoses in Children with Flexible Flatfoot
text: A talus control foot orthosis (TCFO) combines an inverted rigid foot orthosis (RFO) with a broad upright portion that rises well above the navicular to cover and protect the talonavicular joint.

Title: Randomized clinical trial of BiClamp forceps versus clamp-crushing technique in open liver resection
text: The aim of this trial was to compare the efficacy and safety of BiClamp forceps with the "gold-standard" clamp-crushing technique for open liver resection.

Title: Religiosity and religious delusions in schizophrenia - An observational study in a Hindu population
text: Religion exerts a significant effect on the lives of many individuals including people with mental illness.

Title: The effect of Clip-tone(®) and its smartphone application on optimisation of metered-dose inhalers inhalation technique
text: Although metered-dose inhalers (pMDI) therapy is convenient and widely prescribed, its use usually results in repetitive inhalation technique errors.

Title: Skin closure at cesarean delivery, glue vs subcuticular sutures: a randomized controlled trial
text: The optimal choice of skin closure at cesarean delivery has not yet been determined.

Title: Outcomes of Esophageal Stent Therapy for the Management of Anastomotic Leaks
text: The purpose of this study was to present the optimal patient selection for esophageal stenting after esophageal resection to investigate possible factors leading to treatment success or treatment failure in these patients.

Title: Effects of Posturographic Platform Biofeedback Training on the Static and Dynamic Balance of Older Stroke Patients
text: The aim of the experiment was to analyze the influence of posturographic platform biofeedback training on the static and dynamic balance of patients who experienced ischemic stroke.

Title: Early morning oedema in patients with primary varicose veins without trophic changes
text: Chronic lower limb oedema is one of the complications of superficial or deep chronic venous disorders.

Title: Critical thinking intervention for stress reduction among undergraduates in the Nigerian Universities
text: The stress level of undergraduates is increasing at an alarming rate.

Title: Are Perfectionist Therapists Perfect? The Relationship between Therapist Perfectionism and Client Outcomes in Cognitive Behavioural Therapy
text: The psychological literature suggests that therapist perfectionism is common and potentially detrimental to client recovery.

Title: Long-time "real-life" performance of the subcutaneous ICD in patients with electrical heart disease or idiopathic ventricular fibrillation
text: The totally subcutaneous implantable defibrillator (S-ICD) has been designed as a new alternative to conventional implantable defibrillators.

Title: Relationship of Hypertension and Systolic Blood Pressure With the Risk of Stroke or Bleeding in Patients With Atrial Fibrillation: The Fushimi AF Registry
text: Hypertension is considered a major risk factor of stroke and systemic embolism (SE) as well as bleeding in patients with atrial fibrillation (AF).

Title: The Primary Result of Prospective Randomized Multicenter Trial of New Spray-Type Bio-absorbable Adhesion Barrier System (TCD-11091) Against Postoperative Adhesion Formation
text: Postoperative adhesions are the major cause of postoperative complications including intestinal obstruction, infertility, and chronic pelvic pain.

Title: Effect produced on ground reaction forces by a prefabricated, weight-bearing and non-weight-bearing foot orthosis in the treatment of pronated foot: Pilot study
text: The aim of this study is to explore the changes in ground reaction force (GRF) produced by custom-made weight-bearing and nonweight-bearing foot orthoses and by a prefabricated foot orthosis, in the control of the pronated foot.

Title: The Reproducibility of Blood Acid Base Responses in Male Collegiate Athletes Following Individualised Doses of Sodium Bicarbonate: A Randomised Controlled Crossover Study
text: Current evidence suggests sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO<sub>3</sub>) should be ingested based upon the individualised alkalotic peak of either blood pH or bicarbonate (HCO<sub>3</sub><sup>-</sup>) because of large inter-individual variations (10-180 min).

Title: Short-term surgical outcomes from a phase III study of laparoscopy-assisted versus open distal gastrectomy with nodal dissection for clinical stage IA/IB gastric cancer: Japan Clinical Oncology Group Study JCOG0912
text: No confirmatory randomized controlled trials (RCTs) have evaluated the efficacy of laparoscopy-assisted distal gastrectomy (LADG) compared with open distal gastrectomy (ODG).

Title: Expectancy Effects in Self-Help Depression Treatment: First Evidence that the Rationale Given for an Online Study Impacts the Outcome
text: Positive expectations play an important role in effective treatments for major depressive disorder (MDD).

Title: Comparison of two concentrations of triamcinolone injection in the prevention of supratip edema after external rhinoplasty: A randomized trial
text: A comparison of the two methods of corticosteroid (triamcinolone) use in reducing supratip edema (pollybeak deformity) after rhinoplasty.

Title: Genetic characteristics and long-term follow-up of 11 patients with congenital hyperinsulinism followed in a single center
text: Congenital hyperinsulinism (CHI) is a rare disease with an estimated incidence of 1:40,000 live births.

Title: Anterior-posterior displacement of center of pressure measured by insole foot pressure measurement system in subacute recovery stage of post-stroke hemiplegia
text: Anterior-posterior displacement of center of pressure (AP_CoP) reflects stance limb function.

Title: Deep heating therapy via MF radiowaves versus superficial heating therapy in the treatment of nonspecific chronic low back pain: A double blind randomized trial
text: Nonspecific Chronic Low Back Pain (CLBP) is a condition difficult to treat due to multiple etiopathogenesis and there is wide consensus on the multidisciplinary approach.

Title: Effects of 12-week supplementation of Citrus bergamia extracts-based formulation CitriCholess on cholesterol and body weight in older adults with dyslipidemia: a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial
text: Recent experiments suggest that Citrus bergamia extracts could benefit people with dyslipidemia and obesity but this needs to be further validated.

Title: Trunk endurance and gait changes after core stability training in children with hemiplegic cerebral palsy: A randomized controlled trial
text: Weakness of trunk muscles is a common disorder in children with cerebral palsy (CP).

Title: Evaluation of neural therapy effect in patients with piriformis syndrome
text: The aim of this study was to explore the effect of neural therapy on pain and functionality in patients with low back pain due to piriformis syndrome.

Title: An anatomical variant: evaluation of accessory canals of the canalis sinuosus using cone beam computed tomography
text: The anatomical variation of the anterior superior alveolar nerve described as canalis sinuosus (CS) is a less known structure of anterior maxilla.

Title: [Adaptation and validation of five scales to measure determinants of binge drinking in adolescents]
text: The aim of this study was to validate five scales, based on a theoretical framework for the adoption of behaviours, designed to assess the determinants in binge drinking in adolescents, namely: attitude, social influence (model, norm and pressure) and self-efficacy.

Title: The transferrin isoforms in chronic hepatitis
text: The aim of this study was to evaluate the effect of chronic hepatitis on the serum profile of transferrin isoforms.

Title: Periodized training achieves better autonomic modulation and aerobic performance than non-periodized training
text: The aim of the present research was to analyze autonomic response and aerobic performance after performing three different workloads training distributions.

Title: Pre-meal inulin consumption does not affect acute energy intake in overweight and obese middle-aged and older adults: A randomized controlled crossover pilot trial
text: Three-fourths of adults older than 55 years in the United States are overweight or obese.

Title: Effectiveness of Group Behavioural Activation for Depression: A Pilot Study
